pkgmetadata.longdescription: Beatbox is a minimal dependency python library for accessing the salesforce.com web services API. Beatbox3 is meant to be the python3 compatible fork.Its primary dependency is on xmltramp2, a xml parser library that exposes access to the xml document in an easy to use manner.Beatbox is released under the GPL v2.http://www.pocketsoap.com/beatbox/
